metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16687 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Dolibarr 9.0.5 has stored XSS in a User Profile in a Signature section to card.php. A user with the "Create/modify other users, groups and permissions" privilege can inject script and can also achieve privilege escalation.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
